alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 02 at 2:36AM EST until January 03 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Sustained winds of 20 to 29 mph with gusts up to 36 mph. Southwest winds are forecast during the afternoon hours and will then shift to the west and northwest by the evening. * WHERE...Coastal Walton, Bay, Gulf, and Franklin counties. * WHEN... 1PM EST / Noon CST to 4AM EST / 3AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds of 26 to 39 mph are expected for at least 2 hours, or gusts between 40 to 57 mph for any length of time are possible. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; South Walton
